languages.english-overview:
BIGACE is a free and professional grade software package that allows you to set up your own website within minutes.
Its powerful backend puts you in full control of the layout and content of your pages. And when you need more, you can choose from many Plugins and Themes to extend it.
Bigace is designed to provide you with all the features you need from a CMS while having complete freedom to customize it the way you want.
BIGACE is released under the GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2.
